snippet: Most of the commercials opposing the Affordable Care Act have come from Republican outside groups, which have spent about $400 million on the ads.
abstract: Seven months before core provisions of Pres Obama's health care law are to take effect, most television advertising that mentions law continues to come from its opponents; most commercials opposing the Affordable Care Act have come from Republican outside groups, which have spent about $400 million on ads.
lead_paragraph: Most of the commercials opposing the Affordable Care Act have come from Republican outside groups, which have spent about $400 million on the ads.

headline.main: Critics of Health Care Law Outspending Its Supporters on Ads
headline.print_headline: Critics of Health Care Law Outspending Its Supporters on Ads
